text: (napiyē!) Uḷḷaṅkaḷil (nayavañcaka) nōy uḷḷavarkaḷ avarkaḷiṭam (tōḻamai koḷḷavē) viraintu celvatai nīr kāṇpīr! Mēlum, ‘‘(nāṅkaḷ avarkaḷai pakaittuk koṇṭāl) eṅkaḷukku ōr āpattu ēṟpaṭṭuviṭumeṉṟu nāṅkaḷ payappaṭukiṟōm'' eṉṟu avarkaḷ kūṟukiṉṟaṉar. Allāh taṉṉiṭamiruntu veṟṟiyaiyō allatu oru (naṟ)kāriyattaiyō (aticīkkirattil uṅkaḷukku) aḷikkak kūṭum. Atu camayam avarkaḷ taṅkaḷ uḷḷaṅkaḷukkuḷ maṟaittu vaittirunta (mōcamāṉa eṉṉat)taip paṟṟi kavalai aṭaivārkaḷ
